nodes.text: Rycrits were a species in the galaxy whose skins were used in the making of clothing and items. Their meat was also edible, being used to make spiced rycrit strips.
During the Clone Wars, Jedi General Aayla Secura wore a belt made of rycrit hide.
During the reign of the Galactic Empire, White Worms scrumrat Rebolt possessed the Commander of Staves, a staff of his own making which he wrapped with black rycrit leather for insulation.
